description: A state-sponsored program that allows parents, relatives, and friends to invest in a child’s K–12 and college education. A 529 plan may have an age-based or a static portfolio. With an age-based portfolio, the asset allocation becomes more conservative and less aggressive as the child who will benefit from the 529 nears college age. With a static portfolio, the asset allocation stays the same until the 529 owner decides to change it.
title: 529 College Savings Account
